name: UI Button Sound
description: UI button audio from Lyra (W_LyraMenuButton pattern). OnClicked and OnHovered events trigger PlaySound2D for non-spatial UI feedback. Separate sound assets for click and hover allow distinct audio cues. Production pattern for menu buttons, settings toggles, and inventory interactions.
author: Epic Games (Lyra sample)
requires: Sound assets for click and hover

nodes.comment: Button click event — fires on mouse release
Button hover event — fires on mouse enter
Non-spatial click sound — UI bus, no attenuation
Non-spatial hover sound — subtle feedback for mouse-over

variables.name: ClickSound
variables.description: Sound to play on button click

variables.name: HoverSound
variables.description: Sound to play on button hover

notes: PlaySound2D is non-spatial — always plays at full volume regardless of listener position. Route to a UI submix for independent volume control. For focus/gamepad navigation, also bind OnFocusReceived. Consider adding a cooldown or debounce for hover sounds to prevent rapid-fire audio when moving mouse across multiple buttons.
